comment: A composition law for substitution. For versions requiring fewer axioms, but more disjoint variable conditions, see ~ sbco2v and ~ sbco2vv . (Contributed by NM, 30-Jun-1994.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Oct-2016.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 17-Sep-2018.)
